QuestData.Title: They Could Be Anyone
QuestData.Description:
<The still-warm head of the dreadlord Azodius grimaces at you.
The attendants at Keeper's Respite should be told of the Fatescribe's abduction.
No doubt Highlord Fordragon will want to hear of this unexpected threat.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the head of Azodius to Bolvar Fordragon in Keeper's Respite.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Take the head to Bolvar Fordragon in Keeper's Respite.
QuestData.RewardText:
News of the nathrezim infiltrating Korthia is deeply troubling.
How long have they been here? What is their goal?
